ygData.subject: Re: gnome necro in Neriak?
ygData.msgSnippet: Im not sure. I would think after killing enuff halflings to raise your faction with the city you could. ... From: Mark Muller  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Im not sure. I would think after killing enuff halflings to raise your
faction with the city you could.

-----Original Message-----
From: Mark Muller <markm@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, May 07, 1999 1:38 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] gnome necro in Neriak?


>From: "Mark Muller" <markm@...>
>
>Are *any* races other than DE allowed in the 3rd quarter of Neriak? I was
>under the impression that only darkelves could go in there, regardless of
>faction.
>
>
>> I am a gnome necro and am barely tolerated by neriak. But i havnt worked
>on
>> my faction there much as the halfling camps you have to take can be
rough.
>> (dont even take the green camp by yourself) i can get on the first 2
>levels
>> but the main level where the necro guild is I am KOS. Go figure.
>
>
>
